alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued December 15 at 9:28PM CST until December 16 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 566 REMAINS VALID UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHEAST KANSAS CHEROKEE IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 18 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSOURI CAMDEN MARIES MILLER PULASKI IN SOUTHWEST MISSOURI BARRY CHRISTIAN DADE DALLAS GREENE JASPER LACLEDE LAWRENCE MCDONALD NEWTON POLK STONE TANEY WEBSTER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANDERSON, AURORA, AURORA SPRINGS, BAXTER SPRINGS, BOLIVAR, BRANSON, BUFFALO, CAMDENTON, CARTHAGE, CASSVILLE, CHARITY, CHRISTIAN CENTER, COLUMBUS, CRANE, DECATURVILLE, EDGEWATER BEACH, ELDON, ELSEY, FOOSE, FORSYTH, FORT LEONARD WOOD, GOODMAN, GREENFIELD, HOLLISTER, INDIAN POINT, JOPLIN, KIMBERLING CITY, KIRBYVILLE, LAKE OZARK, LAQUEY, LEBANON, LOCKWOOD, LOWELL, LYNCHBURG, MADRY, MARCH, MARIONVILLE, MARSHFIELD, MEINERT, MONETT, MOUNT VERNON, NEOSHO, NEUTRAL, NIXA, NOEL, NORTHVIEW, OLIVE, OSAGE BEACH, OZARK, OZARK BEACH, PINEVILLE, PLAD, POWERSITE, RIVERTON, ROACH, ROCKY COMFORT, ROGERSVILLE, SELMORE, SEYMOUR, SHERWIN, SILVER DOLLAR CITY, SOUTH WEST CITY, SPRINGFIELD, STIPPVILLE, VICHY, VILLAGE OF FOUR SEASONS, WAYNESVILLE, AND WINDYVILLE.
